snippet.title: THE SECRET DOOR - Official GAMEPLAY Trailer
snippet.description:
From the indie horror game "The Secret Door" developed in Unreal Engine 5. 

Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2254300/The_Secret_Door/

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FlamProductions

The Secret Door is a Realistic Horror Game made in Unreal Engine 5. You play as a paranormal investigator who finds himself possessed by the same demon who once tortured your mother. Now, in order to survive, you have to get through 7 levels of puzzles and challenges between past, present and your own mind while uncovering truths about what's real, what was hidden and even your own identity. A claustrophobic experience developed to frighten, shock and make players think.

#unrealengine5 #horrorgaming #indiegame #survivalgame #survivalgames
